gremsReliquary:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
gremsReliquary:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

gremsReliquary:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
gremsReliquary:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
gremsReliquary:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

gremsReliquary:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
gremsReliquary:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

gremsReliquary:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
gremsReliquary:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !gremsReliquary:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

gremsReliquary:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
gremsReliquary:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !gremsReliquary:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
